reviewText: it was not like the traditional story i grew up with

Good to watch with the grandkids. It kept them quite for a while, at least until they parents picked them up. They were very intrested, because I had told them the story before. I am trying to teach them the value of honest.
This will work quite well in my various aged classrooms. I enjoy having the books on a DVD to review as well.  Thank you.

These stories told so beautifully are very worthwhile purchasing for anyone, all ages...it's a delightful series for children to be introduced to the stories we all grew up with, if you didn't......here you go!!!  Enjoy!!!!  Good price too!!!

The title selection on this DVD is blurry and the sound is muffled, such that it is distracting to watch.  My three year old was trying to adjust the DVD player. If this format was in VHS, you'd be trying to adjust the tracking. The bonus cartoons are also of poor quality. The selections on this DVD appear to have been dubbed from a VHS video or from TV programs.
